message.body: so it occurs to me that i don't think i actually know your name? this is lauren, btw.
Oh hai. I figured. If you don't want to keep calling me the Latin name for the American coyote you can call me Erik ;)
so that's where that comes from. are coyotes your spirit animal or something?
I forgot your school ha such late exams, lol. Fair enough
I'm not sure if I'd use the phrase spirit animal but I'd say we have some similar characteristics
What would your spirit animal be then?
i'm a cat, definitely. how are you coyote-like?

I'll tell you as long as you tell me why you and every other girl is a cat, haha.
Hmm we're both a little solitary and resourceful witty bastards
because cats are awesome. that's my main reasoning--clever and persuasive but sort of lonerish.
Cats are definitely the hipsters of the animal kingdom. You're not a hipster now, are you?
not if i can help it! coyotes are pretty mainstream, i guess, they're everywhere nowadays. :P
oh good! i did see one of your brethren in a park on campus last year. no fear, haha.
He was just making the routine rounds. Collecting information, you know.
hahaha. he was a much faster than runner than me, pretty sure i saw him chuckling.
